name: Scratch's Inferno
description:
My submission for the Bruised Egos gamejam. Starring Scratch Ballista.

Scratch is trapped in hell after a near death experience. Help him escape in this action platformer. Utilize the phase mechanic to pass through solid objects, but be warned that if your phase should end while Scratch is inside a solid object it won't be pretty.

~ Fixed issue of duplicate graphics in pause menu.
